summary: This is a forwarded email from July 7, 2019, regarding an attorney's verification to visit Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It confirms the attorney is in good standing in Massachusetts and permitted to meet with Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document states he is the client an attorney is permitted to visit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Attorney Verification for Prison Visit
events.description: An attorney is verified as being in good standing in Massachusetts and is granted permission to visit Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: An attorney was verified and permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein in jail on July 7, 2019.
Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at that time.
The document is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY records (SDNY_00012709).
